title: [Cairnfang Manor, Kasia's Room]
description: Walls of pale grey silk enclose this serene space, matching the plush wintry carpet that spreads across the floor.  Sheer organza curtains undulate from an unseen breeze coming from the sunlit window.  A gracefully curving bed of intertwined pale willow branches rests on a dais in a corner, the aubergine silk coverlet a vivid contrast to the otherwise stark surroundings.  Plush chairs covered in plum-on-silver damask rest in front of an alabaster fireplace, their surfaces carved in swirling arabesque
